title: Doopmarketeer
description: I wrote an app to allow users to see what Doodles 2 items were generated from opening Genesis Boxes and Dooplicating Doodles. It also has other features to view a specific wallet and find undooped doodles.

title: AofL JS
description: Contributing member in an open sourced JavaScript Framework built on Web Components to be used at Age of Learning.

title: QR Code Wallpaper
description: Created a simple app that will let you create a QR code that can be downloaded and used as your lockscreen

title: Fohmo
description: Built a React and EthersJS website that allows users to monitor their balances with OlympusDAO and various OHM forks that launched in 2021
